name: Possession (itch) (hanaindiana)
description:
Short Visual novel.

"A married woman struggling with postpartum depression and grief over the loss of her baby discovers that her husband -- the center of her world -- is cheating on her.

Desperate to get her husband to return at any cost, she pursues him with a dedication that claims her lilfe, but not her spirit, and discovers that as a ghost, there's no boundary she can't cross to win him back."

Music: Yearning by Shane Ivers - https://www.silvermansound.com
